org.microbean.loader.jackson.InputStreamJacksonProvider
org.microbean.loader.jackson.toml.TomlProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider
public class TomlProvider extends InputStreamJacksonProvider
An InputStreamJacksonProvider that reads TOML-formatted application.toml classpath resources.
Author:
Laird Nelson

    • TomlProvider

      public TomlProvider(Type lowerBound, String resourceName)
      Creates a new TomlProvider.
      Parameters:
      lowerBound - the lower type bound of this InputStreamJacksonProvider implementation; may be null
      resourceName - the name of the classpath resource to read from; must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if resourceName is null
